We created Espace Ifèdu with a simple vision: to offer every guest a warm, peaceful, and welcoming place where one truly feels at home.

Your trust is our greatest motivation. Every day, we remain committed to improving our services, listening to your needs, and upholding the values of quality, respect, and hospitality that define our establishment.

Thank you for being part of the Espace Ifèdu journey. We look forward to welcoming you and making your stay as pleasant as possible.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy explains how ESPACE IFEDU collects, uses, and protects the personal data of visitors to its website.

section1.title: 1. Data Controller
section1.content: The ESPACE IFEDU website is operated by the ESPACE IFEDU hotel establishment, located in Porto-Novo, Benin. For any questions, you may contact us using the details provided on the website.

section2.title: 2. Data Collected
section2.content: We only collect data that is strictly necessary, such as information provided through the contact form (name, email address, message), as well as technical data like IP address or browser type.

section3.title: 3. Use of Data
section3.content: Collected data is used solely to respond to contact requests, improve user experience, and ensure proper website operation.

section4.title: 4. Cookies
section4.content: The website may use technical cookies required for its operation and, where applicable, audience measurement cookies. You can manage your preferences through cookie settings.

section5.title: 5. Data Retention
section5.content: Personal data is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.

section6.title: 6. User Rights
section6.content: In accordance with applicable regulations, you have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal data. Requests can be made using the website’s contact details.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: These terms of use govern access to and use of the ESPACE IFEDU website.

section1.title: 1. Website purpose
section1.content: The ESPACE IFEDU website is a showcase website intended to present the hotel’s services, including accommodation, restaurant services, and event spaces.

section2.title: 2. Reservations
section2.content: No reservations or payments are made directly on the website. Reservation requests are handled exclusively via WhatsApp or direct contact with the establishment.

section3.title: 3. Liability
section3.content: ESPACE IFEDU strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information. However, it cannot be held liable for errors, omissions, or temporary unavailability of the website.

section4.title: 4. Intellectual property
section4.content: All content on the website (texts, images, logos) is protected by intellectual property laws. Any unauthorized use or reproduction is prohibited.

section5.title: 5. Cookies and third-party services
section5.content: The website may use technical cookies and third-party services, including interactive maps (e.g. Google Maps). These cookies are necessary for certain features to function properly.

section6.title: 6. Applicable law
section6.content: These terms are governed by the laws in force in the Republic of Benin. In the event of a dispute, an amicable solution will be sought before any legal action.
